verbs.description: Cambridge Analytica , the [V: embattled] [ARG0: data firm] that worked on Donald Trump 's 2016 presidential campaign , announced it is shutting down operations . " The Company is immediately ceasing all operations , " it said in a statement Wednesday , announcing bankruptcy proceedings would soon begin .
